WebMessage.name: kmsgCVUILayoutErrorEmptyCell
WebMessage.TEXT: There is a problem with the current layout, there are empty cells.

WebMessage.TEXT: There is a problem with the current layout, there are overlapping views.

WebMessage.TEXT: The compound layout will be restored to its previous state.

WebMessage.name: kmsgCVUILayoutTryAutoFix
WebMessage.TEXT: The system will attempt to rearrange the views to remedy the problem.

WebMessage.TEXT: شاخص مشاهده ترکیبی (,) خارج از محدوده است

WebMessage.HTML: مشاهده آنالیز از دست رفته است.

WebMessage.HTML: قادر به نمایش مشاهده نمیباشد . خطای ناشناخته رخ داده است.

WebMessage.name: kmsgEVCDownloadTip
WebMessage.HTML: دانلود داده که با کاما ازهم جدا شده است از لیست مقادیر

WebMessage.name: kmsgEVCNoColumns
WebMessage.HTML: The analysis cannot be performed because it contains no columns.

WebMessage.name: kmsgEVCNoColumnsQA
WebMessage.HTML: The question can't be answered because the system cannot determine which columns are being asked for. Please make sure you're using terms from the selected Subject Area.

WebMessage.name: kmsgEVCNoCursor
WebMessage.HTML: The analysis cannot be performed because an unknown error occurred and the system was not able to load the required cursor.

WebMessage.name: kmsgEVCNoCursorQA
WebMessage.HTML: The question can't be answered because an unknown error occurred and the system was not able to load the required cursor.

WebMessage.name: kmsgEVCNoRows
WebMessage.HTML: The specified criteria didn't result in any data.

WebMessage.name: kmsgEVCNoRowsFilters
WebMessage.HTML: The specified criteria didn't result in any data. This is often caused by applying filters and/or selections that are too restrictive or that contain incorrect values. Please check your Analysis Filters and try again. The filters currently being applied are shown below.

WebMessage.name: kmsgEVCNoRowsQA
WebMessage.HTML: The question didn't return an answer. This is often caused by the system misinterpreting your question and applying filters that are too restrictive or don't make sense. Try asking the question in a different way, or switch to the point-and-click interface.

WebMessage.name: kmsgEVCNoRowsQAFilters
WebMessage.HTML: The question didn't return an answer. This is often caused by the system misinterpreting your question and applying filters that are too restrictive or don't make sense. Try asking the question in a different way, or switch to the point-and-click interface. The filters currently being applied are shown below.

WebMessage.name: kmsgNarrativePrePostfixHelpText
WebMessage.HTML:
Enter text to display before and after the formatted results. To display line breaks (in HTML) between the results and surrounding text, enclose surrounding text in
...tags or place
tags after and before the Prefix and Postfix, respectively.

WebMessage.name: kmsgNarrativeRowFormatHelpText
WebMessage.TEXT:
You can include markup tags in the text. To insert a line break, you must type appropriate markup for the device you are targeting. For example, type
for HTML, or
for WML. Pressing Enter will not result in multiple lines of text. The characters '@', '[', ']', and '\' are reserved characters. When typing one of these you must precede them with '\', i.e. '\@' or '\\'.

WebMessage.name: kmsgNarrativeViewDescription
WebMessage.TEXT: This view displays the results as one or more paragraphs of text. You can type in a sentence with placeholders for each column in the results, as well as specify how rows should be separated.

WebMessage.name: kmsgEmptyCompoundLayoutView
